text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The sun's shining, and the sky is<n>clear. Bolstered by the
pleasant<n>weather, I happily make my way to<n>the trainers'
office, when I hear a<n>sudden cry.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You there! Move it, move it, MOOOVE<n>IT!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Stomp, stomp, stomp!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Skid!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I hardly have time to react before the<n>Umamusume
approaching me at<n>breakneck speed—Sakura Bakushin<n>
O—comes to a grinding halt seconds<n>before collision.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Phew! Emergency brakes are<n>working like a CHARM! As
expected,<n>my swiftness extends to my<n>decision-making
and reaction time too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: My deepest and sincerest apologies!<n>I was in a hurry!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
However, please be aware that<n>you're on Tracen Academy
grounds!<n>Here, we RUN in the halls, and the last<n>one
through the school gate is a rotten<n>egg!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ah... I'm afraid our discussion on the<n>expectations and
realities of Tracen<n>Academy conduct will have to wait!<n>For
you see...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
My beloved classmates are awaiting<n>the arrival of their
devoted class<n>representative!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fear not, my constituents, your<n>FEARLESS leader is on her
way!<n>Bakushin, Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My eyes widen as Sakura Bakushin<n>O takes off with the
same speed and<n>force that carried her to me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her lecture was a bit all over the<n>place, but in this case, her
actions<n>literally speak louder than words. I'm<n>in awe at
her speed...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You there! Stop!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Don't think you can fool the eyes of<n>the class
representative! I see all!<n>Especially if you're trying to skip
out<n>on cleaning duty!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Representatiiive sprint! Draaagh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hear ye! Hear ye! Your class<n>representative has exciting
news!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Today's cafeteria dessert is sakura<n>mochi! That's right, the
same<n>delectable rice cakes that delight the<n>taste buds of
all, especially me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, follow me to glorious dessert!<n>Bakushiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems like no matter where I go, I<n>run into Sakura
Bakushin O. Reflecting<n>on the strange string of coincidences,<n>
I sit down at my desk, when<n>suddenly...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock! Slide...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Pardon the intrusion and greetings!<n>Class Representative
Sakura<n>Bakushin O, at your service!
choice_data_list: Uh... I already know your name...
Uh... I already know your name...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You do?! H-how? Wait, could it be...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Did you by chance hear of my<n>spotless conduct as class<n>
representative?! Well, I don't blame<n>you for being
impressed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, you're too kind! Soon I will<n>surpass normal class
representation<n>and be elevated to the Class<n>
Representative Hall of Fame! Now, tell<n>me all that you've
heard!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps to Sakura Bakushin O's<n>disappointment, I quickly
remind her<n>that we met this morning.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it, you dolook familiar!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That I do! And with thatmisunderstanding out of the way,there's nothing to get in the way ofour newfound friendship! A win for allinvolved!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well then, with that new bond forged,<n>I will be on my way!
Until we meet<n>again!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I DIDN'T COME HERE TO MAKE<n>FRIENDS!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The teacher is counting on me, the<n>trustworthy class
representative, to<n>deliver these documents to you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She hands me the documents, which I<n>skim over. They look
to be about the<n>tryouts happening this weekend.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As my eyes wander down the page, I<n>spot the name
"Sakura Bakushin O"<n>listed as one of the racers...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No problem at all! You can always<n>count on the class
representative to<n>get the job done!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now to report back to the teacher...<n>After that, I need to
replace the water<n>in the flower vases, change the<n>school
newspaper, and prepare the<n>training course.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course! If I want to be a good class<n>representative and
role model, I need<n>to give my all!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And giving my all is something I'vealways been very good at, evenas a kid!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Those math problems about apples<n>and oranges?
Easy-peasy for a<n>PRODIGY! A game of tag? There's<n>
never been a faster player!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
From the moment I let out my first<n>cries as a baby, my
parents knew that<n>I was destined for greatness. We<n>just
didn't know how...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That is, until that fateful day in first<n>grade when I realized my
true calling!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Care to take a guess? I'll give you ahint: It starts with c and rhymeswith "glass photosensitive."

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ding, ding, ding! Cooorrect!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'll never forget how I was observing<n>the butterflies outside
when the<n>teacher asked for candidates. It was<n>so quiet, I
could hear the clock ticking.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That's when the teacher looked at<n>me, the one seated at
the front of the<n>class, and said the words that<n>changed my
life...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The class representative serves as a<n>model for all other
students to look up<n>to. Only the hardest-working students<n>
can do it. Would you like to try?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And in that moment... I knew!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I exist to be class representative, and<n>the role of class
representative exists<n>for me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I was born to be the classrepresentative! Why else would I begifted with so much talent andbrains?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah, would you look at the time!<n>Apologies, but I must be off!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And with that, Sakura Bakushin O<n>takes off with the same
boundless<n>energy I saw this morning.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her reasons for being class<n>representative feel a touch<n>
exaggerated, but I am curious to see<n>how her tryout race
goes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just a little though...
